nodes.text: The Yaga Minor shipyards were shipyards located on Yaga Minor that serviced the Galactic Empire. In 14 BBY, members of the Free Ryloth Movement led by Pok hijacked an Imperial weapons shipment at the shipyards. The rebels fled in a stolen freighter and attempted to rendezvous with Cham Syndulla and his ship. However, Pok and his team were pursued by Darth Vader, who slaughtered Pok and his team. In response, Cham decided to escalate his insurgency against the Empire.
The Yaga Minor shipyards were mentioned in the 2015 novel Lords of the Sith, written by Paul S. Kemp.
